item.title: Taming contentEditable with jQuery
item.description: What is it? This is a few examples of how one might extend jQuery to make the contentEditable a more manageable component of the web. For convenience I am just going to show the web-standards, so one will need workarounds for IE < 9. A more comprehensive suite (and from whose work I derive many of my answers) is rangy.js by Tim Down. Why is it important? The contentEditable flag is one of the few ways to get WYSIWYG styling on the web.
